name: ENVS 100L
title: Ecology and Society Writing Laboratory
description: Required writing lab accompanying course 100. Students are introduced to writing in different styles and for different audiences typical of the ecosystem-society interface.  Course 100 writing assignments are developed, written, and revised in conjunction with the lab.  W credit is granted only upon successful completion of course 100.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): Satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements. Concurrent enrollment in ENVS 100 is required.
